message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $150. This product has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. I believe it could greatly benefit you and enhance your experience. Please let me know if this offer suits your expectations.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $120 for it. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
